vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-nested-if
vulnerability_findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-decrement-not-postfix

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
Unitroller.fallback (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2909-2924) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = comptrollerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2911-2913)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UnitrollerAdminStorage.comptrollerImplementation (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2663-2665) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- adminOrInitializing (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3906-3918)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1134-1196) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1160)
	-transferFrom (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1174)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2417-2429):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2418-2419)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2425-2426)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2480-2490):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2481-2482)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2487-2488)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2349-2368):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2357-2358)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2360-2361)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModel (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2545-2555):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2546-2547)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2552-2553)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2552-2553)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2561-2591):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2580-2582)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2583-2585)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setReserveFactor (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2373-2383):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2374-2375)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserveFactorMantissa (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2380-2381)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ComptrollerG1._supportMarket (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3856-3873):
	External calls:
	- cToken.isCToken() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3865)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- markets (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3867-3868)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.accrueInterest (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1581-1659):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1598)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1650)
	- borrowIndex (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1651)
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1652)
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1653)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowInternal (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1911-1919):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1912)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1918)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1918)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ComptrollerG1.exitMarket (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3102-3154):
	External calls:
	- (oErr,tokensHeld,amountOwed) = cToken.getAccountSnapshot(msg.sender) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3105-3106)
	- allowed = redeemAllowedInternal(cTokenAddress,msg.sender,tokensHeld) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3114-3115)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountAssets (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3146-3147)
	- accountAssets (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3147-3149)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.initialize (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1223-1254):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1237)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1241)
	- borrowIndex (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1242)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2123-2138):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2124)
	- error = cTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2130)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,cTokenCollateral) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2137)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2137)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.redeemFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1810-1904):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.redeemAllowed(address(this),redeemer,vars.redeemTokens) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1850)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1893)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.repayBorrowBehalfInternal (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2019-2027):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2020)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2026)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2026)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.repayBorrowInternal (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2003-2011):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2004)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,msg.sender,repayAmount) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2010)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2010)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: vars in CToken.repayBorrowFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2059) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: actualAddAmount in CToken._addReservesFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2438-2440) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: vars in CToken.redeemFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1813) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: vars in CToken.mintFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1706) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: vars in CToken.borrowFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1950) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
ComptrollerG1._supportMarket (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3856-3873) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-cToken.isCToken() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3865)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (MathError err, Exp memory fraction) = divScalarByExp(scalar, divisor);
vulnerability_findings.message:

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1933-1996):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.borrowAllowed(address(this),borrower,borrowAmount) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1935)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1985)
	- accountBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1986)
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1987)
